data.name: ServiceCollectionExtensions_Schema_Name_Is_Mandatory
data.value: The schema name is mandatory in order to add validation rules.

data.name: DefaultDocumentValidatorFactory_Schema_Name_Is_Mandatory
data.value: The schema name is mandatory in order to create a validator.

data.name: DocumentValidatorContext_Context_Invalid_State
data.value: The context has an invalid state and is missing the schema.

data.name: ErrorHelper_VariableIsNotCompatible
data.value: The variable `{0}` is not compatible with the type of the current location.

data.name: ErrorHelper_DirectiveNotValidInLocation
data.value: The specified directive is not valid the current location.

data.name: ErrorHelper_DirectiveNotSupported
data.value: The specified directive `{0}` is not supported by the current schema.

data.name: ErrorHelper_TypeSystemDefinitionNotAllowed
data.value: A document containing TypeSystemDefinition is invalid for execution.

data.name: ErrorHelper_UnionFieldError
data.value: A union type cannot declare a field directly. Use inline fragments or fragments instead.

data.name: ErrorHelper_FieldDoesNotExist
data.value: The field `{0}` does not exist on the type `{1}`.

data.name: ErrorHelper_LeafFieldsCannotHaveSelections
data.value: Field "{0}" must not have a selection since type "{1}" has no subfields.

data.name: ErrorHelper_ArgumentValueIsNotCompatible
data.value: The specified argument value does not match the argument type.

data.name: ErrorHelper_FieldValueIsNotCompatible
data.value: The specified value type of field `{0}` does not match the field type.

data.name: ErrorHelper_VariableDefaultValueIsNotCompatible
data.value: The specified value type of variable `{0}` does not match the variable type.

data.name: ErrorHelper_NoSelectionOnCompositeField
data.value: Field "{0}" of type "{1}" must have a selection of subfields. Did you mean "{0} {{ ... }}"?

data.name: ErrorHelper_NoSelectionOnRootType
data.value: Operation `{0}` has a empty selection set. Root types without subfields are disallowed.

data.name: ErrorHelper_FieldIsRequiredButNull
data.value: `{0}` is a required field and cannot be null.

data.name: ErrorHelper_FieldsAreNotMergeable
data.value: Encountered fields for the same object that cannot be merged.

data.name: ErrorHelper_FragmentNameNotUnique
data.value: There are multiple fragments with the name `{0}`.

data.name: ErrorHelper_FragmentNotUsed
data.value: The specified fragment `{0}` is not used within the current document.

data.name: ErrorHelper_FragmentCycleDetected
data.value: The graph of fragment spreads must not form any cycles including spreading itself. Otherwise an operation could infinitely spread or infinitely execute on cycles in the underlying data.

data.name: ErrorHelper_FragmentDoesNotExist
data.value: The specified fragment `{0}` does not exist.

data.name: ErrorHelper_FragmentNotPossible
data.value: The parent type does not match the type condition on the fragment.

data.name: ErrorHelper_FragmentTypeConditionUnknown
data.value: Unknown type `{0}`.

data.name: ErrorHelper_FragmentOnlyCompositeType
data.value: Fragments can only be declared on unions, interfaces, and objects.

data.name: ErrorHelper_InputFieldAmbiguous
data.value: There can be only one input field named `{0}`.

data.name: ErrorHelper_InputFieldDoesNotExist
data.value: The specified input object field `{0}` does not exist.

data.name: ErrorHelper_InputFieldRequired
data.value: `{0}` is a required field and cannot be null.

data.name: ErrorHelper_OperationNameNotUnique
data.value: The operation name `{0}` is not unique.

data.name: ErrorHelper_OperationAnonymousMoreThanOne
data.value: GraphQL allows a short‚Äêhand form for defining query operations when only that one operation exists in the document.

data.name: ErrorHelper_VariableNotInputType
data.value: The type of variable `{0}` is not an input type.

data.name: ErrorHelper_VariableNameNotUnique
data.value: A document containing operations that define more than one variable with the same name is invalid for execution.

data.name: ErrorHelper_ArgumentNotUnique
data.value: More than one argument with the same name in an argument set is ambiguous and invalid.

data.name: ErrorHelper_ArgumentRequired
data.value: The argument `{0}` is required.

data.name: ErrorHelper_ArgumentDoesNotExist
data.value: The argument `{0}` does not exist.

data.name: ErrorHelper_SubscriptionSingleRootField
data.value: Subscription operations must have exactly one root field.

data.name: ErrorHelper_SubscriptionNoTopLevelIntrospectionField
data.value: Subscription must not select an introspection top level field.

data.name: ErrorHelper_MaxExecutionDepth
data.value: The GraphQL document has an execution depth of {0} which exceeds the max allowed execution depth of {1}.

data.name: ErrorHelper_DirectiveMustBeUniqueInLocation
data.value: Only one of each directive is allowed per location.

data.name: ErrorHelper_IntrospectionNotAllowed
data.value: Introspection is not allowed for the current request.

data.name: ErrorHelper_OneOfMustHaveExactlyOneField
data.value: The Oneof Input Object `{0}` requires that exactly one field must be supplied and that field must not be `null`.

data.name: ErrorHelper_OneOfVariablesMustBeNonNull
data.value: The variable `${0}` assigned to the field `{1}` of the Oneof Input Object `{2}` must be non-null.

data.name: ErrorHelper_DeferAndStreamNotAllowedOnMutationOrSubscriptionRoot
data.value: The defer and stream directives are not allowed to be used on root fields of the mutation or subscription type.

data.name: ErrorHelper_DeferAndStreamDuplicateLabel
data.value: If a label is passed, it must be unique within all other @defer and @stream directives in the document.

data.name: ErrorHelper_DeferAndStreamLabelIsVariable
data.value: If a label for @defer or @stream is passed, it must not be a variable.
